title: Bridges to Career Opportunities
summary: LISC’s Bridges to Career Opportunities initiative is an innovative program that successfully connects adults to the training, job opportunities and services they need to not only build promising careers, but thrive. Meet the 40 community-based organizations that are launching or expanding Bridges programming in their communities with support from the Citi Foundation, and learn how they are helping unemployed and underemployed adults compete for jobs in growth industries.
